text: Gu kha gava khergiap, gu mba tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui guma ga ndɨkndɨgap, ana khergi fhuvara. Gu mba harigi guma, guma mbe tɨva mbatɨgen ana muuŋgi, gu mba guma ga ndɨrgap kha gava khergi fhuvara. Gu khueŋ vuzvugiap, kha gava khergi, nden tɨvir vhuuiŋ za kɨrar hɨgɨrga. Nde Fhe Bakɨme nɨman, nde tuituigip khueŋ kaŋgirga, nde guigira wari won ndavir nza nɨɨŋgi. Gu kha bigɨna nɨɨeŋra nzuav, gu kha gava khergiap, nde ndi mbarigi.
